Table: Natural Armor Conversion to DR
Natural Armor/DRDR ProvidedAttacker Size to Bypass DR
Natural armor withDR/adamantineHuge DR/magic
Natural armor withDR/—Gargantuan DR/adamantine
Natural armor with DR/—DR/—1Colossal
Natural armor with DR/epicDR/epic1n/a
1 A creature that already has DR/— or DR/epic increases its DR by an amount equal to its natural armor bonus.
